name: immutable-di
description: Simple, promise-based dependency injection container with some state handling functions (for facebook flux-like state-management)

scripts.prepublish: npm run lint && npm run test
scripts.pull: git checkout master && git pull origin master && npm run build && git add . --all && git commit -am build || exit 0
scripts.release-patch: npm run pull && npm version patch && npm run push
scripts.release-minor: npm run pull && npm version minor && npm run push
scripts.release-major: npm run pull && npm version major && npm run push
scripts.clean: rm -rf cursors define react utils __tests__ container.js index.js *.map
scripts.test.cov: babel-istanbul cover --report text --report html node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha -- --reporter dot --compilers js:babel/register tests.js --timeout 5000

author: Stefan Zerkalica <zerkalica@gmail.com>
